How To Play 

->In this game there are two players one computer and another user,now user has to ROLL the dice and the number which comes up will be added to the current score. 

->If the number one comes up your current score will be set to 0, and the turn will pass on to the computer and again user can take the turn. 

->If you press HOLD the current score will be added to the total score and then the turn will be passed on to the computer. 

->User's and Computer's total score will be shown at the top of the screen. 

->One who scores 100 first will be the winner. 

->Press RESET to set all the scores to 0 and play again.
